headline: 3 Reasons CRL is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Charles River Laboratories’s shares have sunk to $173.44, producing a disappointing 15.7% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
